title: Fortune to You
detail_text: <:th_ch0007/>Setsuna-chan, the cards have told me that your worries will be gone soon<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Re-, really?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Yeah. So don’t make that grim face anymore. I haven’t seen your smile since you got here okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I-, I’m sorry for being rude! I’ve just been thinking on my own…. Sorry!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Fufu, you don’t have to apologize! I want to see your smile more than that~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Ehehe. I'm glad I consulted you, Nozomi-san. It’s gonna be alright, I thought!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Speaking of which, what are you worried about? It might be something I can help with….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Eh!? Umm…. It’s….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Hmm hmm<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>For the past year, a novel that I love hasn’t been published…. So I wondered if it’ll come out this year….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Ahaha! So that’s what it’s about~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>To have made you worry because of a reason like this, I’m truly sorry!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>It’s fine, it’s fine. So your beloved novel can get published, let’s write your wish in a shrine plaque! I’ll take you to the shrine that I’m helping at!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
